about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Global Partner
about.description: Shanghai Zhang Xiaoqiang Enterprise Consulting Firm is a professional consulting and implementation service company based in Shanghai, serving clients nationwide. We have deep expertise in overseas expansion services, committed to providing efficient, professional, and one-stop international solutions for enterprises across various industries.
about.highlight: We empower enterprise global expansion with AI technology, accumulating rich resources and practical experience in TCM (Traditional Chinese Medicine) overseas expansion, helping clients quickly seize global business opportunities and achieve brand globalization.
